title: Kale & Terra
description: This is a short story that falls after book 7 in The Texas Kings MC book series.  Kale and Terra had a whirlwind love story and now they are preparing for parenthood. Surrounded by family and friends, and having hit a few speed bumps on the way to their happily ever after, the two of them are excited to meet their baby. As with all pregnancies, it's a roller coaster ride until the very end.  Join them for a few days as one of our favorite couples brings their first child into the world.
author: Cee Bowerman
